channel.title: Weird Error - Much Thanks
channel.description:
Hello, I get this error when I start my server. It is PI source. I added a few snippets, but couldn't see relation of this error to them. I added, chat logs.
Here is the error, much thanks!
[CODE][12/23/10 7:45 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Com munications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,293,149,739,604 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance 0(Native Method) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance (Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createCommunicationsException (SQLError.java:1074) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionI mpl.java:2214) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.<init>(ConnectionImpl.j ava:773) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.<init>(JDBC4Connection .java:46) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance 0(Native Method) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance (Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(ConnectionI mpl.java:352) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegist eringDriver.java:282) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at server.util.SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:17) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:104) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsExc eption: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,293,149,739,604 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance 0(Native Method) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance (Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createCommunicationsException (SQLError.java:1074) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:341) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionI mpl.java:2137) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: ... 13 more [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co nnect [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
[12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Sou rce) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(Standard SocketFactory.java:253) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:290) [12/23/10 7:45 PM]: ... 14 more[/CODE]

item.title: Weird Error - Much Thanks
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Your link for the MYSQL to connect is failed, maybe a wrong domain or site.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Error - Much Thanks
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Cannot connect to the mysql data base:

Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect

Read full topic
